Introduction

WE:A (Korean: 위아; Japanese: ウィア) is an upcoming four-member boy group. They will make their Japanese debut on April 4, 2023 with their single "24/7:Twenty-Four/Seven".

On March 26, the group announced their first Korean digital single "24/7:Twenty-Four/Seven" will be released on March 29. Additionally, they revealed through their Twitter that their fandom name would be THE1.
